pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Large Herbivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() True $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Neutral $(br)$(l)Type:$() Herd Animal $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Grasslands $(br)$(l)Special Ability:$() Crop Harvesting

Journal Page by $(l)Unknown Survivor$() $(br2)The Triceratops is an herding herbivore. They're mostly-peaceful unless approached too closely, and their babies can be tamed with veggies. They can be ridden with a saddle and chested, along with harvest your crops. Press Space while riding your chested Triceratops to switch into Harvesting Mode.
